CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- 매칭중 ... UI 띄워줌
local Entity = self.Entity local MatchingState = Entity:GetChildByName("MatchingState", true) local MatchingMessage = Entity:GetChildByName("MatchingMessage", true)
MatchingState.TextComponent.Text = "매칭중 ..." MatchingMessage.TextComponent.Text = ""
